casebody.data:
CITY OF HICKORY, Plaintiff,
v.
Willie James GRIMES, National Casualty Company, Travelers Indemnity Company, North Carolina Insurance Guaranty Association, Argonaut Great Central Insurance Company, Twin City Fire Insurance Company and TIG Insurance Company, Defendants. No. COA17-441 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: June 5, 2018

REVERSED. REMANDED.
